item.title: Version 1.1.10+23
item.description: (+) New change on add asset & pavement inspection feature: - users can inspect all asset on their relative highways - users now should be just input parameter distress rather than input severity & priority too (+) New change on report status "Done" -> "Normal"

item.description: (+) New change on add asset & pavement inspection feature: - users can inspect all asset on their relative highways - users now should be just input parameter distress rather than input severity & priority too (+) New change on report status "Done" -> "Normal"
